channel.title: Can't make shops, but can make NPC's, Help me
channel.description:
[i]Hi, please help me witch the problem. Before i got problem, i can't make NPC's, the problem i solved , got before virus. and now i can make NPC's, but i can't make shops
[b]Old Error, When i can't make NPC's:[/b] at java.langNumerFormatException.forInputString(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at NPCHandler.loadAutoSpawn(NPCHandler.java:2098) at NPCHandler.<init>(NPCHandler.java:549 at server.main(server.java:111)
[b]New Error When i try make a shop:[/b] at java.lang.NumberFormatException.forInputString(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at ShopHandler.loadShops(ShopHandler.java80) at ShopHandler.<init>(ShopHandler.java:33) at server.main(server.java:127)
[b]How i can make a shop? (i added the)[/b] in autospawn.cfg:spawn = 522 3208 3422 0 0 0 0 0 1 Arhien-General Store in shops.cfg:shop = 19 Test_Shop 1 1 316 500 444 500 in client.java:} else if (NPCID == 522) { // Test_Shop PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 19;[/i]

item.title: Can't make shops, but can make NPC's, Help me
item.dc:creator: @artyr artyr
item.description:
@artyr wrote:

[i]Hi, please help me witch the problem.
Before i got problem, i can’t make NPC’s, the problem i solved , got before virus.
and now i can make NPC’s, but i can’t make shops

Old Error, When i can’t make NPC’s:
at java.langNumerFormatException.forInputString(Unknown Source)
at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source)
at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source)
at NPCHandler.loadAutoSpawn(NPCHandler.java:2098)
at NPCHandler.(NPCHandler.java:549
at server.main(server.java:111)

New Error When i try make a shop:
at java.lang.NumberFormatException.forInputString(Unknown Source)
at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source)
at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source)
at ShopHandler.loadShops(ShopHandler.java80)
at ShopHandler.(ShopHandler.java:33)
at server.main(server.java:127)

How i can make a shop? (i added the)
in autospawn.cfg:spawn = 522 3208 3422 0 0 0 0 0 1 Arhien-General Store
in shops.cfg:shop = 19 Test_Shop 1 1 316 500 444 500
in client.java:} else if (NPCID == 522) {
// Test_Shop
PutNPCCoords = true;
WanneShop = 19;[/i]

Read full topic
item.source: Can't make shops, but can make NPC's, Help me
